prompt: Re-write this music caption in three different styles. You can mix the order of the instruments.
inputs: This song includes Piano, Drums, Bass, Guitar, Organ, but without Synth Lead.
captions:
Style 1:
This piece of music features Piano, Drums, Bass, Guitar, and Organ, but no Synth Lead.

Style 2:
This song is composed of Piano, Drums, Bass, Guitar, and Organ, omitting the Synth Lead.

Style 3:
The instruments used in this song are Piano, Drums, Bass, Guitar, and Organ, with no Synth Lead.
